content: these pretty toadstools are such a quick easy knit that you ll want to knit a whole fairy ring they are knit in the round on dpns in one piece to finish simply flip down the cap and embroider on some spots that s it mine are made in worsted because i like them to stand independently but sock/fingering will look pretty too if you like my vibe you may want to check out my wee folk valley group 2 i always post my photos there first and it s full of positivity and whimsy i hope you enjoy this free pattern happy knitting natasha 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/the-toadstool-folk 2 https //www ravelry com/groups/wee-folk-valley
